name: 黃復隆
objective:
本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋及圖論等。
This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, searching, and graph.
